SELECT cp.id, cp.name, cp.prefix_url as prefixUrl, cp.enabled, cp.is_default as isDefault, COALESCE(fi.file_count, 0) as fileCount, COALESCE(fi.total_size, 0) as totalSize, COALESCE(fi.total_downloads, 0) as totalDownloads FROM cdn_prefix cp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cdn_prefix, COUNT(*) as file_count, SUM(file_size) as total_size, SUM(download_count) as total_downloads FROM file_info GROUP BY cdn_prefix ) fi ON cp.prefix_url = fi.cdn_prefix ORDER BY cp.is_default DESC, fi.file_count DESC
